primaryPhoto.description:
21 years since it all began… the world’s favourite rock theatrical WE WILL ROCK YOU is finally returning to London’s West End in 2023 for a limited 12-week season at the London Coliseum – the same iconic stage that saw Freddie Mercury’s 1979 Royal Ballet performance. This event will go down in musical theatre history.
Since 2002 over 20 million theatergoers in 28 countries have thrilled to this awe-inspiring production. Featuring 24 of Queen’s biggest hits, including We Are The Champions, Bohemian Rhapsody, Radio Ga Ga and Don’t Stop Me Now, and Ben Elton’s hilarious futuristic comedy writing combined, comes a show that boasts the scale and spectacle that marked the band’s legendary live performances.
This global phenomenon remains one of the most spectacular musicals to grace the stage, and dazzles all the senses in breath-taking style. Guaranteed to blow your mind, this musical phenomenon is not to be missed!
Book your WE WILL ROCK YOU theatre tickets with LOVEtheatre today!
